mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_INVENTORY ( F_ID, F_SHOPNUM, F_CREATE_TIMESTAMP, F_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP, F_COMMODITYID ) VALUES ( #{inventory.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inventory.shopNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, sysdate, sysdate, #{inventory.commodityId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_INVENTORY SET F_SHOPNUM = #{inventory.shopNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, F_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP = sysdate WHERE F_ID = #{inventory.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE T_INVENTORY SET F_SHOPNUM = 0, F_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP = sysdate WHERE F_ID = #{inventory.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_INVENTORY WHERE F_COMMODITYID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT t1.F_ID, t2.F_NAME, t2.F_EN_NAME, t1.F_CREATE_TIMESTAMP, t1.F_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP, t1.F_SHOPNUM FROM T_INVENTORY t1 LEFT JOIN T_COMMODITY t2 ON t1.F_COMMODITYID = t2.F_Id WHERE 1 = 1
AND t2.F_NAME like '%' || #{inventory.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
